name: Bellfall
description:
Lyra's mundane life is suddenly interrupted by Isabelle Vega, the new girl at work. She gets dragged along for many different silly adventures and dates, and who knows, maybe they'll end up falling for each other...

The game takes around 30 minutes to play and it has 3 different endings. This game was made for NaNoRenO 2023.

Features
  • A floating island!
  • Neon signs!
  • Romance!
  • Multiple endings!
  • Hand holding!
  • A lot of stargazing!
  • A cat that may or may not understand human speech???
Soundtrack

You can go listen to the soundtracks here! I'm really proud of it!

If you're interested, here's a playlist with music that inspired the soundtrack!

Credits

Art, story & music: Kyanite Heart.

Thanks to NomnomNami and my girlfriend for checking for spelling errors.
